HotkeyScript.name: PauseHotkey
HotkeyScript.script: if not $cavebot or not $targeting then listas('Enabling Cavebot and Targeting') setcavebot('on') settargeting('on') wait(1000) else listas('Disabling Cavebot and Targeting') setcavebot('off') settargeting('off') stopattack() wait(1000) end

PersistentScript.name: MidnightSetup
SS at Death
PersistentScript.script:
init start takeSS = true init end auto(200)
if $hppc < 10 and $connected and takeSS then screenshot($name.. " died at "..currenttime()) waitping() traymessage('Death', 'Your character has died at waypoint '..$wptid.. ' of section '..$wptsection..'.', 5000) takeSS = false end

PersistentScript.name: SS at Level
PersistentScript.script: init start local curlevel = $level init end auto(200) if $level > curlevel then wait(300,400) screenshot($name.." - Level "..$level) traymessage('Level Up!', 'Congratulations! You advanced from Level ' ..curlevel.. ' to Level ' ..$level, 5000) curlevel = $level end

PersistentScript.name: SpellsMS
PersistentScript.script:
--[[ Midnight Scripters's Shooter, MS version MS_SHOOTER = { Author = 'RoxZin xD & TheNick', Version = '0.7.0' } ]] UEName = getuseroption('UE Type') Mobs = {'Banshee', 'Bonelord', 'Bonebeast', 'Mummy', 'Ghost', 'Vampire', 'Lich', 'Necromancer', 'Demon Skeleton', 'Crypt Shambler'} MobsToUe = {'Lich', 'Bonebeast', 'Vampire', 'Necromancer', 'Crypt Shambler'} FrigoMobs = {'Lich', 'Demon Skeleton', 'Banshee'} GranFlam = {'Bonebeast', 'Lich', 'Vampire', 'Necromancer', 'Ancient Scarab'} AoEAmount = tonumber(getuseroption("Amount of monsters to cast Rune.")) UEAmount = tonumber(getuseroption("Amount of monsters to cast UE.")) filteruseroptions(true) auto(200)
if $vocshort ~= 'S' then return else if maroundspell(UEName, 'any', unpack(MobsToUe)) >= UEAmount and CastMasVis and cancast(UEName) and (paround(7, true) == 0 or not PVP) then cast(UEName) wait(500) end
if cooleddown("Rune") and itemcount(Rune) > 0 then -- the previous check is just to avoid calculating -- the area rune tile when rune is still on cooldown
local temp = getarearunetile(not PVP, unpack(Mobs)) if temp.amount >= AoEAmount then pausewalking(random(100,300)) useitemon(Rune, 0, temp.tile) pausewalking(0) return end end
if $attacked.id > 0 and $attacked.dist <= 3 and $attacked.isshootable then if $target.hppc >= 25 and cancast("exori gran vis") and $target.name == "Banshee" then cast("exori gran vis") wait(400) elseif $target.hppc >= 25 and cancast("exori gran flam") and table.find(GranFlam, $target.name) then cast("exori gran flam") wait(400) elseif table.find(FrigoMobs, $target.name) and cancast("exori frigo") then cast("exori frigo") wait(400) elseif cancast("exori flam") then cast("exori flam") wait(400) end end end

PersistentScript.name: HealerActionMage
PersistentScript.script:
--[[ Midnight Scripters's Healer Action, Mage version MS_HEALER = { Author = 'RoxZin xD', Version = '2.0.0' } ]] setpriority(80, 70, 1000, 3000, 0) auto(60,90) if $vocshort == 'D' or $vocshort == 'S' then if $hppc <= 60 and $mp >= 160 then cast("exura vita") wait(500) elseif $hppc >= 61 and $hppc <= 82 and $mp >= 70 then cast("exura gran") wait(500) elseif $hppc >= 83 and $hppc < 93 and $mp >= 20 then cast("exura") wait(500) end
if itemcount(MP) > 0 and $mppc < random(45,50) then useoncreature(MP, $self) wait(500) end
if $paralyzed then if $hppc <= 60 then cast("exura vita") wait(500) elseif $hppc <= 82 and $hppc >= 66 then cast("exura gran") wait(500) elseif $hppc >= 83 then cast("exura") wait(500) end end
if windowcount(SupplyBP) > 0 then setsetting('PotionHealer/Enabled', 'no') else setsetting('PotionHealer/Enabled', 'yes') end else return end

PersistentScript.name: Anti Stalker
PersistentScript.script:
init start -- local SCRIPT_VERSION = '1.0.1'
local invisCreatures = {'Stalker', 'Dark Magician'} local stuckTime = 5 -- Set to 0 to always attack local spellToUse = 'avalanche rune'
-- DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE -- table.lower(invisCreatures) local spellToUseInfo, spellType = spellinfo(spellToUse), 'spell' if spellToUseInfo.castarea == 'None' then spellToUseInfo, spellType = runeinfo(spellToUse), 'rune' end init end
auto(100)
if $standtime >= stuckTime*1000 then foreach newmessage m do if m.type == MSG_STATUSLOG then local _, _, name = m.content:match(REGEX_DMG_TAKEN) if name and table.find(invisCreatures, name:lower()) and maround(7, name:lower()) == 0 then if spellType == 'spell' and cancastspell(spellToUseInfo) then cast(spellToUseInfo.words) waitping() elseif spellType == 'rune' then useoncreature(spellToUseInfo.itemid, $self) waitping() end end end end end

PersistentScript.name: NewPersistentScript
PersistentScript.script:
auto(500) dontlist()
if $wptsection == "Hunt" then if maround(4, "Necromancer") > 0 then setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Mummy/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Ghost/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Crypt Shambler/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') else setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Mummy/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Ghost/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Crypt Shambler/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') end
if maround(4, "Lich") > 0 then setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Bonebeast/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') else setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Bonebeast/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') end end

PersistentScript.name: Mana Walk
PersistentScript.script:
auto(500)
if $posz == 15 and $wptsection == "Hunt" then while itemcount(MP) > 0 and maround() == 0 and $mppc < random(70,75) do useoncreature(MP, $self) wait(500) end end

PersistentScript.name: EatFood
PersistentScript.script:
auto(50000)
if not $pzone then eatfoodfull() end

PersistentScript.name: NewPersistentScript1
PersistentScript.script: auto(300,600) for id = 283, 285 do if itemcount(id) > 20 then moveitems(id, 'ground') return end end

PersistentScript.name: NewPersistentScript2
PersistentScript.script:
init start local minHppc = 100 -- Minimum monster hppc
-- DO NOT EDIT ANYTHING BELOW -- local Positioning = { {Dir = 's', x = 0, y = 1}, {Dir = 'n', x = 0, y = -1}, {Dir = 'w', x = -1, y = 0}, {Dir = 'e', x = 1, y = 0}, } init end
auto(100, 200) if $attacked.id > 0 and $attacked.hppc <= minHppc then for _, v in ipairs(Positioning) do if v.Dir == $self.dir then
if iscreatureontile($posx+v.x, $posy+v.y, $posz, "player") then local tempSelfDir = $self.dir local freeDirs = {} for i, j in ipairs(Positioning) do if j.Dir ~= tempSelfDir and not iscreatureontile($posx + j.x, $posy+j.y, $posz, "player") then table.insert(freeDirs, j.Dir) end end
if #freeDirs > 0 then turn(freeDirs[math.random(1, #freeDirs)]) else ignorecreature($attacked.id) end end break end end end
-- Stop attack ignored creature if $attacked.ignored then keyevent(0x1B) waitping() end
-- Let's unignore these creatures that are ignored atm -- if no players around if paround(10) == 0 and $timems - $playerlastseen > 6000 then foreach creature m "mf" do if m.ignored then ignorecreature(m.id, true) end end end

PersistentScript.name: NewPersistentScript3
PersistentScript.script:
auto(200)
foreach newmessage m do if m.content == "There is not enough gold on your account." and m.channel == "NPCs" then setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'no') printerror("Client closed due to low balance.") closeclient() end end

HUDScript.name: MonitorMyStats
HUDScript.script:
init start -- -- 88 -- "" ,d -- 88 -- ,adPPYba, 88 8b,dPPYba, 88,dPYba,,adPYba, ,adPPYYba, MM88MMM ,adPPYba, -- I8[ "" 88 88P' "Y8 88P' "88" "8a "" `Y8 88 a8P_____88 -- `"Y8ba, 88 88 88 88 88 ,adPPPPP88 88 8PP""""""" -- aa ]8I 88 88 88 88 88 88, ,88 88, "8b, ,aa -- `"YbbdP"' 88 88 88 88 88 `"8bbdP"Y8 "Y888 `"Ybbd8"' --
-- Name: Monitor My Stats -- Last Updated: 19/12/2013 -- Version: 1.0
local MMS = { ShowInfo = true,
Title = "SCRIPT INFO", Creator = "by RoxZin xD", Info = '[MS] Ancient Ruins Tomb', Version = '1.0.0' }
-- [[ Do not change anything below this line. ]] --
filterinput(false, true, false, false)
local HUD_Sections = { {Name = 'OTHERS', State = true, Items = { {'Ping', function() return $ping .. ' (avg: ' .. $pingaverage .. ')' end}, {'Bank Balance', function() return num($balance) end}, } },
{Name = 'CHARACTER STATS', State = true, Items = { {'Level', function() return $level .. ' (' .. 100 - math.floor(($exp - expatlvl($level)) * 100 / (expatlvl($level + 1) - expatlvl($level))) .. '%)' end}, {'Experience', function() return num($exp) end}, {'Magic Level', function() return $mlevel .. ' (' .. 100 - $mlevelpc .. '%)' end}, {'Weapon Skill', function() local _ = WeaponSkill() return _.skill .. ' (' .. 100 - _.skillpc .. '%)' end}, {'Shielding', function() return $shielding .. ' (' .. 100 - $shieldingpc .. '%)' end}, {'Fishing', function() return $fishing .. ' (' .. 100 - $fishingpc .. '%)' end} } },
{Name = 'ENGINE STATES', State = true, Items = { {'Spell Healer', function() return getsetting('SpellHealer/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('SpellHealer/Enabled') end}, {'Potion Healer', function() return getsetting('PotionHealer/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('PotionHealer/Enabled') end}, {'Condition Healer', function() return getsetting('ConditionHealer/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('ConditionHealer/Enabled') end}, {'Mana Training', function() return getsetting('ManaTrainer/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('ManaTrainer/Enabled') end}, {'Cavebot', function() return getsetting('Cavebot/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('Cavebot/Enabled') end}, {'Looting', function() return getsetting('Looting/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('Looting/Enabled') end}, {'Targeting', function() return getsetting('Targeting/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('Targeting/Enabled') end} } },
{Name = 'BOTTING STATS', State = true, Items = { {'Experience per Hour', function() return num($exphour) end}, {'Experience Left', function() return num(exptolevel()) end}, {'Experience Today', function() return num($expgained) end}, {'Time to Next Level', function() return time(timetolevel()) end}, {'Played Time', function() return time(math.floor($charactertime / 1000)) end}, {'Stamina', function() return time($stamina) end} } } }
local HUD_Colors = { Font = color(255, 255, 255, 0), SectionHeaderBackground = {0.0, color(36, 68, 105, 20), 0.23, color(39, 73, 114, 20), 0.76, color(21, 39, 60, 20)}, EntryNameBackground = {0.0, color(75, 75, 75, 20), 0.23, color(45, 45, 45, 20), 0.76, color(19, 19, 19, 20)}, EntryValueBackground = {0.0, color(145, 95, 0, 20), 0.23, color(158, 104, 0, 20), 0.76, color(84, 55, 0, 20)}, EntryValueEnabledBackground = {0.0, color(65, 96, 12, 20), 0.23, color(67, 99, 13, 20), 0.76, color(36, 52, 6, 20)}, EntryValueDisabledBackground = {0.0, color(90, 12, 15, 20), 0.23, color(98, 13, 17, 20), 0.76, color(52, 6, 9, 20)}, }
function WeaponSkill() local SkillTypes = { ['axe'] = {type = 'axe', skill = $axe, skillpc = $axepc}, ['club'] = {type = 'club', skill = $club, skillpc = $clubpc}, ['sword'] = {type = 'sword', skill = $sword, skillpc = $swordpc}, ['bow'] = {type = 'distance', skill = $distance, skillpc = $distancepc}, ['distance weapon'] = {type = 'distance', skill = $distance, skillpc = $distancepc}, ['no weapon'] = {type = 'fist', skill = $fist, skillpc = $fistpc}, ['rod'] = {type = 'magic', skill = $mlevel, skillpc = $mlevelpc}, ['wand'] = {type = 'magic', skill = $mlevel, skillpc = $mlevelpc}, }
return SkillTypes[findweapontype()] end
local Moving, Temp, Moved = false, {0, 0}, {0, 0}
function inputevents(e) if (e.type == IEVENT_LMOUSEDOWN) then for _, Section in ipairs(HUD_Sections) do if (e.elementid == Section.StateSwitch) then Section.State = not Section.State return end end for _, Section in ipairs(HUD_Sections) do if (Section.Name == 'ENGINE STATES') then for _, SectionItem in ipairs(Section.Items) do if (e.elementid == SectionItem[4]) then SectionItem[3]() return end end end end end
if (e.type == IEVENT_MMOUSEDOWN) then Moving, Temp = true, {$cursor.x - Moved[1], $cursor.y - Moved[2]} end
if (e.type == IEVENT_MMOUSEUP) then Moving = false end end
setmaskcolorxp(0) init end
if (Moving) then auto(10) Moved = {$cursor.x - Temp[1], $cursor.y - Temp[2]} end
setposition($clientwin.left + 5 + Moved[1], $worldwin.top + 15 + Moved[2]) setfontstyle('Tahoma', 8, 75, 0xFFFFFF, 1, color(0, 0, 0, 20))
local YPosition, SectionRow, SectionItemsRow = 0, 0, 0
if MMS.ShowInfo then local StringWidth, StringHeight = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 22) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.SectionHeaderBackground)) drawroundrect(0, 0, 240, 21, 2, 2) drawtext(MMS.Title, 6, 21 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 22) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueBackground)) drawroundrect(130, 0, 110, 21, 2, 2) drawtext(MMS.Creator, 136, 21 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5)
setfontsize(7)
local StringWidth, StringHeight = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryNameBackground)) drawroundrect(0, 24 + 0 * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(MMS.Info, 6, 24 + 0 * 18 + 15 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryNameBackground)) drawroundrect(0, 24 + 1 * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2) drawtext('Script version:', 6, 24 + 1 * 18 + 15 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueBackground)) drawroundrect(130, 24 + 1 * 18, 110, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(MMS.Version, 136, 24 + 1 * 18 + 15 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
YPosition = 22 + 2 * 19 end
for SectionIndex, Section in ipairs(HUD_Sections) do setfontsize(8)
local StringWidth, StringHeight = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.SectionHeaderBackground)) drawroundrect(0, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19), 240, 20, 2, 2) drawtext(Section.Name, 6, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19) + 20 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) if (Section.State) then addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueEnabledBackground)) else addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueDisabledBackground)) end Section.StateSwitch = drawroundrect(220, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19), 20, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('X', 228, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19) + 20 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
SectionRow = SectionRow + 1
if (Section.State) then setfontsize(7)
local StringWidth, StringHeight = measurestring('TEMP')
for SectionItemIndex, SectionItem in ipairs(Section.Items) do setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 17) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryNameBackground)) drawroundrect(0, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19), 240, 16, 2, 2) drawtext(SectionItem[1], 6, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19) + 16 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
if (Section.Name == 'ENGINE STATES') then local EngineCurrentState = SectionItem[2]()
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 17) if (EngineCurrentState == 'yes') then addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueEnabledBackground)) else addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueDisabledBackground)) end HUD_Sections[SectionIndex].Items[SectionItemIndex][4] = drawroundrect(130, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19), 110, 16, 2, 2)
drawtext((EngineCurrentState == 'yes' and ('On')) or ('Off'), 136, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19) + 16 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1) else setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 17) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueBackground)) drawroundrect(130, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19), 110, 16, 2, 2) drawtext(SectionItem[2](), 136, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19) + 16 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1) end
SectionItemsRow = SectionItemsRow + 1 end end end

HUDScript.name: MonitorMyHunting
HUDScript.script:
init start -- -- 88 -- "" ,d -- 88 -- ,adPPYba, 88 8b,dPPYba, 88,dPYba,,adPYba, ,adPPYYba, MM88MMM ,adPPYba, -- I8[ "" 88 88P' "Y8 88P' "88" "8a "" `Y8 88 a8P_____88 -- `"Y8ba, 88 88 88 88 88 ,adPPPPP88 88 8PP""""""" -- aa ]8I 88 88 88 88 88 88, ,88 88, "8b, ,aa -- Author: `"YbbdP"' 88 88 88 88 88 `"8bbdP"Y8 "Y888 `"Ybbd8"' -- -- Monitor My Hunting! -- -- Version: 1.0 -- Created: 29.12.2013 -- Last update: 29.12.2013 --
local MMH = { SHOW_ALL_ITEMS = false, SHOW_ALL_SUPPLIES = false, }
-- [[ Do not change anything below this line. ]] --
-- [[ COLORS ]] -- MMH.COLORS = {} MMH.COLORS.FONT_COLOR = color(255, 255, 255, 0) MMH.COLORS.SECTION_HEADER_BACKGROUND = {0.0, color(36, 68, 105, 20), 0.23, color(39, 73, 114, 20), 0.76, color(21, 39, 60, 20)} MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND = {0.0, color(75, 75, 75, 20), 0.23, color(45, 45, 45, 20), 0.76, color(19, 19, 19, 20)} MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_VALUE_BACKGROUND = {0.0, color(145, 95, 0, 20), 0.23, color(158, 104, 0, 20), 0.76, color(84, 55, 0, 20)} MMH.COLORS.RESULT_POSITIVE_BACKGROUND = {0.0, color(65, 96, 12, 20), 0.23, color(67, 99, 13, 20), 0.76, color(36, 52, 6, 20)} MMH.COLORS.RESULT_NEGATIVE_BACKGROUND = {0.0, color(90, 12, 15, 20), 0.23, color(98, 13, 17, 20), 0.76, color(52, 6, 9, 20)} MMH.COLORS.RESET_BUTTON_BACKGROUND = MMH.COLORS.RESULT_POSITIVE_BACKGROUND
-- [[ ELEMENTS ]] -- MMH.ELEMENTS = {} MMH.ELEMENTS.RESET_BUTTON = -1 MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_ITEMS_LOOTED = -1 MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_SUPPLIES_USED = -1
-- [[ SECTION STATES ]] -- MMH.SECTIONS = {} MMH.SECTIONS.ITEMS_LOOTED = true MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED = true
-- [[ OTHERS ]] -- filterinput(false, true, false, false)
local MOVING, TEMP, MOVED = false, {0, 0}, {0, 0}
function inputevents(e) if (e.type == IEVENT_LMOUSEDOWN) then if (e.elementid == MMH.ELEMENTS.RESET_BUTTON) then resetcharactertime() resetlootcounter() resetexpcounter() elseif (e.elementid == MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_ITEMS_LOOTED) then MMH.SECTIONS.ITEMS_LOOTED = not MMH.SECTIONS.ITEMS_LOOTED elseif (e.elementid == MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_SUPPLIES_USED) then MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED = not MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED end end
if (e.type == IEVENT_MMOUSEDOWN) then MOVING, TEMP = true, {$cursor.x - MOVED[1], $cursor.y - MOVED[2]} end
if (e.type == IEVENT_MMOUSEUP) then MOVING = false end end
setmaskcolorxp(0) init end
if (MOVING) then auto(10) MOVED = {$cursor.x - TEMP[1], $cursor.y - TEMP[2]} end
setposition($clientwin.right - 424 + MOVED[1], $worldwin.top + MOVED[2]) setfontstyle('Tahoma', 8, 75, MMH.COLORS.FONT_COLOR, 1, color(0, 0, 0, 20))
local ROW_QUANTITY, STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = 0, measurestring('TEMP') local ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH, ITEM_LOOTED_QUANTITY, ITEM_LOOTED_WORTH = 0, 0, 0 local SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH, SUPPLY_USED_QUANTITY, SUPPLY_USED_WORTH = 0, 0, 0
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 0, 240, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('Monitor My Hunting v1.0', 6, 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESET_BUTTON_BACKGROUND)) MMH.ELEMENTS.RESET_BUTTON = drawroundrect(196, 0, 44, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('RESET', 202, 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfontsize(7)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 23, 240, 15, 2, 2) drawtext('Looting Accuracy', 6, 23 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5 + 1)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_VALUE_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(130, 23, 110, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(string.format('%.2f', $lootaccuracy) .. '%', 136, 23 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5 + 1)
setfontsize(8)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.SECTION_HEADER_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 41, 240, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('ITEMS LOOTED', 6, 41 + 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) if (MMH.SECTIONS.ITEMS_LOOTED) then addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_POSITIVE_BACKGROUND)) else addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_NEGATIVE_BACKGROUND)) end MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_ITEMS_LOOTED = drawroundrect(220, 41, 20, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('X', 228, 41 + 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfontsize(7)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
foreach lootingitem ItemEntry do if (MMH.SHOW_ALL_ITEMS or ItemEntry.amountlooted > 0) then ITEM_LOOTED_QUANTITY = ItemEntry.amountlooted ITEM_LOOTED_WORTH = ItemEntry.sellprice * ITEM_LOOTED_QUANTITY
if (MMH.SECTIONS.ITEMS_LOOTED) then setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2)
setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_SourceOver) drawitem(ItemEntry.id, 6, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 50, 100) setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_Automatic)
drawtext(((#ItemEntry.name > 16 and string.match(string.sub(ItemEntry.name, 1, 16), '(.-)%s?$') .. '...') or ItemEntry.name):capitalizeall(), 28, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_VALUE_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(130, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 110, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(num(ITEM_LOOTED_QUANTITY) .. ' (' .. math.floor(ITEM_LOOTED_WORTH / 100) / 10 .. 'K)', 136, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
ROW_QUANTITY = ROW_QUANTITY + 1 end
ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH = ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH + ITEM_LOOTED_WORTH end end
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2) drawtext('Total: ' .. num(ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH) .. ' GPs', 6, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
ROW_QUANTITY = ROW_QUANTITY + 1
setfontsize(8)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.SECTION_HEADER_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('SUPPLIES USED', 6, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) if (MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED) then addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_POSITIVE_BACKGROUND)) else addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_NEGATIVE_BACKGROUND)) end MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_SUPPLIES_USED = drawroundrect(220, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 20, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('X', 228, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfontsize(7)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
foreach supplyitem ItemEntry do if (MMH.SHOW_ALL_SUPPLIES or ItemEntry.amountused > 0) then SUPPLY_USED_QUANTITY = ItemEntry.amountused SUPPLY_USED_WORTH = ItemEntry.buyprice * SUPPLY_USED_QUANTITY
if (MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED) then setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2)
setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_SourceOver) drawitem(ItemEntry.id, 6, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 50, 100) setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_Automatic)
drawtext(((#ItemEntry.name > 16 and string.match(string.sub(ItemEntry.name, 1, 16), '(.-)%s?$') .. '...') or ItemEntry.name):capitalizeall(), 28, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_VALUE_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(130, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 110, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(num(SUPPLY_USED_QUANTITY) .. ' (' .. math.floor(SUPPLY_USED_WORTH / 100) / 10 .. 'K)', 136, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
ROW_QUANTITY = ROW_QUANTITY + 1 end
SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH = SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH + SUPPLY_USED_WORTH end end
if (MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED) then setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2)
setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_SourceOver) drawitem(3031, 6, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 50, 100) setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_Automatic)
drawtext('Money Spent', 28, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_VALUE_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(130, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 110, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(num($moneyspent) .. ' (' .. math.floor($moneyspent / 100) / 10 .. 'K)', 136, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
ROW_QUANTITY = ROW_QUANTITY + 1 end
SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH = SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH + $moneyspent
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2) drawtext('Total: ' .. num(SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH) .. ' GPs', 6, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
ROW_QUANTITY = ROW_QUANTITY + 1
setfontsize(8)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) if (ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH >= SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH) then addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_POSITIVE_BACKGROUND)) else addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_NEGATIVE_BACKGROUND)) end drawroundrect(0, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 20, 2, 2) drawtext(((ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH >= SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH and ('PROFIT: ')) or ('WASTE: ')) .. num(ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH - SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH) .. ' GPs (' .. math.abs(math.floor(((ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH - SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH) * 3600) / ($charactertime / 1000) / 100) / 10) .. ' k/h)', 6, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)

HUDScript.name: RecentLootHUD
HUDScript.script:
init start -- SCRIPT_VERSION = '1.1.0' local warnItems = {'bonebeast trophy', 'yellow gem', 'boots of haste', 'blue robe', 'terra mantle', 'platinum amulet', 'spellbook of warding', 'skull staff', 'lightning boots', 'noble axe', 'castle shield', 'terra rod', 'bonelord shield', 'mini mummy', 'maxilla maximus', 'sweet smelling bait', 'red robe', 'vampire shield', 'ice rapier'} -- you can add more items here local maxMsgs = 8 -- max lines to display at once local msgTimeOut = 90000 -- will only show loots from the last 30 seconds
local position = 'left' -- right or left local rareLootColor = 0xFFC800 local lootColor = 0xFAFAFA
-- dont edit anything below this line local fontsize = 7 local fontspacing = fontsize + 6 local isRight = (position == 'right') local msgs = {}
setfontstyle("Tahoma", fontsize, 75, lootColor, 1, 0x002200) setmaskcolorxp(0) init end
foreach newmessage m do if m.level == 0 and m.content:sub(0,8) == 'Loot of ' then local msgInfo = m.content:lootmsg() local color = lootColor local hasItems = false
local msg = msgInfo.name .. ': '
local lastIndex = #msgInfo.items for index, item in ipairs(msgInfo.items) do hasItems = true
if (item.count > 1) then msg = msg .. item.count .. ' ' end msg = msg .. item.name if index ~= lastIndex then msg = msg .. ', ' end
if table.find(warnItems, item.name) then color = rareLootColor end end
if (hasItems) then local msgWidth = measurestring(msg) table.insert(msgs, {['msg'] = msg, ['color'] = color, ['time'] = $timems, ['width'] = msgWidth}) end end end
local msgsLen = #msgs local longestLine = 0 if isRight then for index = msgsLen, math.max(msgsLen - maxMsgs + 1, 1), -1 do if msgs[index].width > longestLine then longestLine = msgs[index].width end end end
local i = 1 while (i <= msgsLen) do if $timems - msgs[i].time <= msgTimeOut and i > msgsLen - maxMsgs then setfontcolor(msgs[i].color) addtext(msgs[i].msg, tern(isRight, longestLine - msgs[i].width - 2, 2), i*fontspacing)
i = i + 1 else table.remove(msgs, i) end
msgsLen = #msgs end
if not isRight then setposition($worldwin.left + 3, $worldwin.bottom - i*fontspacing) else setposition($worldwin.right - 3 - longestLine, $worldwin.bottom - i*fontspacing) end
if msgsLen == 0 then -- to clear HUD when resetting script addtext('', 0, 0) end

Option.userOptionsScript:
{ "type" : "scriptinfo", "name" : "MS - Ancient Ruins Tomb", "version" : "1.0.0", "author" : "RoxZin xD" }, { "type" : "group", "name" : "Optionals", "children" : [ { "type" : "checkbox", "name" : "PVP on?", "description" : "Check this box if you wish to be PVP-safe.", "text" : "PVP Settings", "value" : false }, { "type" : "checkbox", "name" : "Haste on Spawn?", "description" : "Check this box if you wish to use haste on spawn.", "text" : "Haste on Spawn", "value" : true }, { "type" : "checkbox", "name" : "Use Reach?", "description" : "Check this box if you wish to use reach.", "text" : "Use Reach", "value" : true }, { "type" : "checkbox", "name" : "Stake?", "description" : "Check this box if you wish to use stake/knife.", "text" : "Use Stake/Knife", "value" : true }, { "type" : "checkbox", "name" : "Soft Refill?", "description" : "Check this box if you wish to refill soft boots.", "text" : "Soft Refill", "value" : false }, { "type" : "spinbox", "name" : "Softs to Refill?", "description" : "Choose the amount of soft boots to repair.", "text" : "Low Softs:", "min" : 1, "suffix" : " worn softs", "value" : 1 }, { "type" : "checkbox", "name" : "Use Training Statues?", "description" : "Check this box if you wish to use training statues.", "text" : "Offline Trainer", "value" : true }, { "type" : "combobox", "name" : "Statue to use:", "description" : "Choose the skill you wish to train.", "text" : "Skill to train:", "items" : ["Magic"] }, { "type" : "lineedit", "name" : "Capacity to leave cave?", "description" : "Write the capacity to leave cave.", "text" : "Min Cap:", "value" : "700" }, { "type" : "checkbox", "name" : "Optimize Hunting?", "description" : "Check this box if you wish to optimize hunting.
(Or if you have high ping)", "text" : "High Ping", "value" : false } ] }, { "type" : "group", "name" : "Supplies", "column" : 2, "children" : [ { "type" : "combobox", "name" : "MP Name", "description" : "Choose the mana potion you wish to use.", "text" : "Manas:", "items" : ["Great Mana Potion"] }, { "type" : "lineedit", "name" : "Total amount of MP to buy.", "description" : "Write the total amount of MP to buy.", "text" : "Total MP:", "value" : "200" }, { "type" : "lineedit", "name" : "Amount of MP to skip refill.", "description" : "Write the amount of MP to skip refill.", "text" : "Hunt MP:", "value" : "160" }, { "type" : "lineedit", "name" : "Amount of MP to leave.", "description" : "Write the amount of MP to leave cave.", "text" : "Low MP:", "value" : "80" }, { "type" : "combobox", "name" : "Rune Name", "description" : "Choose the mana potion you wish to use.", "text" : "Runes:", "items" : ["Avalanche Rune"] }, { "type" : "lineedit", "name" : "Total amount of Rune to buy.", "description" : "Write the total amount of Rune to buy.", "text" : "Total Rune:", "value" : "400" }, { "type" : "lineedit", "name" : "Amount of Rune to skip refill.", "description" : "Write the amount of Rune to skip refill.", "text" : "Hunt Rune:", "value" : "360" }, { "type" : "lineedit", "name" : "Amount of Rune to leave.", "description" : "Write the amount of Rune to leave cave.", "text" : "Low Rune:", "value" : "100" } ] }, { "type" : "group", "name" : "Hunt Setup", "column" : 2, "children" : [ { "type" : "checkbox", "name" : "North Side?", "description" : "Check this box if you wish to hunt north side.
(Level 110+)", "text" : "North Side", "value" : true }, { "type" : "checkbox", "name" : "East Side?", "description" : "Check this box if you wish to hunt east side.
(Level 100+)", "text" : "East Side", "value" : true }, { "type" : "checkbox", "name" : "South Side?", "description" : "Check this box if you wish to hunt south side.
(Level 115+)", "text" : "South Side", "value" : true }, { "type" : "checkbox", "name" : "West Side?", "description" : "Check this box if you wish to hunt west side.
(Level 120+)", "text" : "West Side", "value" : true } ] }, { "type" : "group", "name" : "Withdraw Coins", "checkable" : true, "column" : 2, "children" : [ { "type" : "spinbox", "name" : "Total amount of coins to withdraw.", "description" : "Choose the total amount of coins to withdraw.", "text" : "Total Coins:", "min" : 1, "suffix" : " scarab coins", "value" : 50 }, { "type" : "spinbox", "name" : "Amount of coins to refill.", "description" : "Choose the amount of coins to refill.", "text" : "Low Coins:", "min" : 1, "suffix" : " scarab coins", "value" : 10 } ] }, { "type" : "group", "name" : "Attacking Setup", "children" : [ { "type" : "checkbox", "name" : "Use UE?", "description" : "Check this box if you wish to use UE.", "text" : "Cast UE", "value" : true }, { "type" : "combobox", "name" : "UE Type", "description" : "Choose the UE type you wish to use.", "text" : "UE Type", "items" : ["Exevo Gran Mas vis"] }, { "type" : "spinbox", "name" : "Amount of monsters to cast UE.", "description" : "Choose the amount of monsters to cast UE.", "text" : "Cast UE If:", "min" : 1, "suffix" : " monsters", "value" : 8 }, { "type" : "spinbox", "name" : "Amount of monsters to cast Rune.", "description" : "Choose the amount of monsters to cast Rune.", "text" : "Cast Rune If:", "min" : 1, "suffix" : " monsters", "value" : 3 } ] }

CavebotScript.name: Safe Bank
CavebotScript.script:
auto(200)
foreach newmessage m do if m.content == "There is not enough gold on your account." and m.type == MSG_NPC then setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'no') printerror("Client closed due to low balance.") closeclient() end end

CavebotScript.name: Drop Vials
CavebotScript.script: --[[ Midnight Scripters's Randomized Drop Vials Action MS_VIALS = { Author = 'RoxZin xD', Version = '1.1.0' } ]] auto(200) if not $pzone and maround() == 0 then while (flasks() > 0 and $cap < random(110,130)) or ($cap < random(200,220) and flasks() >= random(50,60)) do pausewalking(200) moveitems(283, 'ground', '0-15', 100) moveitems(284, 'ground', '0-15', 100) moveitems(285, 'ground', '0-15', 100) pausewalking(0) break end waitping() end

CavebotScript.name: NewCavebotScript
CavebotScript.script:
auto(1000) dontlist()
local cre = {'Banshee', 'Bonelord', 'Bonebeast', 'Mummy', 'Ghost', 'Vampire', 'Ancient Scarab', 'Lich', 'Necromancer', 'Demon Skeleton', 'Crypt Shambler'} local area = {'SArea', 'SArea1', 'SArea2', 'SArea3', 'SArea4', 'SArea5', 'SArea6', 'SArea7', 'SArea8', 'SArea9', 'SArea10', 'SArea11', 'SArea12', 'SArea13', 'SArea14', 'SArea15', 'SArea16', 'SArea17', 'SArea18', 'SArea19', 'SArea20', 'SArea21', 'SArea22', 'SArea23', 'SArea24'}
if itemcount(Coin) >= AmountCoin then setsetting('Looting/LootList/scarab coin/LootingDestination', 'lootbp') else setsetting('Looting/LootList/scarab coin/LootingDestination', 'supplybp') end
if MP:lower():match('strong mana potion') then setsetting('Looting/LootList/strong mana potion/LootingDestination', 'supplybp') setsetting('Looting/LootList/strong mana potion/Category', 'x') setsetting('Supplies/Items/strong mana potion/BuyPrice', '80') else setsetting('Supplies/Items/strong mana potion/BuyPrice', '0') setsetting('Looting/LootList/strong mana potion/Category', 's') setsetting('Looting/LootList/strong mana potion/LootingDestination', 'lootbp') end
if itemcount(Coin, SupplyBP) > 0 and not iscontainerfull(MainBP) and $wptsection ~= 'Hunt' then moveitems(Coin, MainBP, SupplyBP) end
setsetting('PotionHealer/Rules/MP/Spell', MP)
for i = 1, #cre do for j = 1, #area do if getuseroption('Use Reach?') then setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/'..cre[i]..'/Setting1/Stance', 'Reach') setareapolicy(area[j], 'none') else setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/'..cre[i]..'/Setting1/Stance', 'Away In Line') setareapolicy(area[j], 'targeting') end end end
set('Looting/LootList/platinum coin/Destination', MainBP)

CavebotScript.name: NewCavebotScript1
CavebotScript.script:
auto(200) dontlist()
if itemcount(MP, MainBP) > 0 and not iscontainerfull(SupplyBP) then while itemcount(MP, MainBP) > 0 and not iscontainerfull(SupplyBP) do moveitems(MP, SupplyBP, MainBP) waitping() end end
if itemcount(Rune, MainBP) > 0 and not iscontainerfull(SupplyBP) then while itemcount(Rune, MainBP) > 0 and not iscontainerfull(SupplyBP) do moveitems(Rune, SupplyBP, MainBP) waitping() end end

CavebotScript.name: SkinStake
CavebotScript.script:
auto(500) dontlist()
if getuseroption('Stake?') then if itemcount('blessed wooden stake') > 0 and maround() == 0 and $lootbodies == 0 then pausewalking(500) stake(7,true, false) pausewalking(0) return end
if itemcount('obsidian knife') > 0 and maround() == 0 and $lootbodies == 0 then pausewalking(500) skin(7) pausewalking(0) return end end

CavebotScript.name: Optimize Hunting
CavebotScript.script:
auto(200)
if getuseroption('Optimize Hunting?') then if $wptsection == 'Hunt' then set('Cavebot/WalkingMethod', 'Walk With Arrow Keys') else set('Cavebot/WalkingMethod', 'Walk With Map-Clicks') end end

CavebotScript.name: NewCavebotScript2
CavebotScript.script:
auto(50000) dontlist()
if not $pzone then eatfoodfull() end

CavebotScript.name: NewCavebotScript3
CavebotScript.script:
auto(500) dontlist()
if $posz == 14 and $wptsection == "Hunt" then gotolabel("downHunt", "toHunt") end

CavebotScript.name: Haste
CavebotScript.script:
auto(500) dontlist()
if ($wptsection ~= 'Hunt' or HasteOnSpawn) and not $hasted and not $pzone and $standtime < 5000 and $mp >= 100 and $hppc >= 85 and maround() == 0 then cast('utani gran hur') wait(500) end

Waypoint.script: if islocation(6) then return elseif $posz == 15 then gotolabel(0, "Hunt") end

--open lootbp set('Looting/OpenNextBP', 'no') if windowcount() == 4 then closewindows(GoldBP) waitping() closewindows(MainBP) waitping() closewindows(SupplyBP) waitping() else closewindows() waitping() repeat openitem(MainBP, "back") waitcontainer(MainBP, true) until windowcount(MainBP) == 1 waitping() repeat openitem(LootBP, MainBP) waitcontainer(LootBP, true) until windowcount(LootBP) == 1 waitping() resizewindows() waitping()
repeat openitem(LootBP, LootBP) waitcontainer(LootBP, false) until itemcount(LootBP, LootBP) == 0 waitping() end
if windowcount(LootBP) ~= 1 then waitping() gotolabel($wptid-1) end
--deposit items set('Looting/OpenNextBP', 'no') wait(500,700) depotaction('depotbp', 'lootbp', {'s', 'stackdpbp', 'r', 'raredpbp'})

--open suppdpbp set('Looting/OpenNextBP', 'no') if WithdrawCoins then closewindows() waitping() repeat openitem(MainBP, "back") waitcontainer(MainBP, true) until windowcount(MainBP) == 1 waitping()
opendepot() waitping() repeat openitem(SuppDpBP, "Depot Chest") waitcontainer(SuppDpBP, false) until windowcount(SuppDpBP) == 1 waitping() resizewindows() waitping()
if windowcount() ~= 2 then waitping() gotolabel($wptid-1) end else gotolabel("skipWithdraw") end

--withdraw coins
if itemcount(Coin, SuppDpBP) > 0 and itemcount(Coin, MainBP) < LowCoin then while itemcount(Coin, SuppDpBP) > 0 and itemcount(Coin, MainBP) < AmountCoin and not iscontainerfull(SupplyBP) do moveitemsupto(Coin, AmountCoin, MainBP, SuppDpBP) wait(500,1000) end end
local amountToSave = 16 local transferTo = $worldname say("hi") wait(1000,1600) npcsay("deposit all") wait(110,150) npcsay("yes") wait(1100,1500) npcsay("balance") wait(1100,1500) if $balance > amountToSave then npcsay(string.format("transfer %d to Nud %s", math.max(0, $balance - amountToSave), transferTo)) wait(110,150) npcsay("yes") wait(130,160) npcsay('withdraw 16') wait(110,150) npcsay("yes") end
--open next bp if itemcount(SuppDpBP, SuppDpBP) > 0 and (itemcount(Coin, ExtraBP) < AmountCoin) then waitping() openitem(SuppDpBP, SuppDpBP) waitping() gotolabel($wptid-1) end
--check location MS_checkLoc(2)

--open supplybp closewindows() waitping() repeat openitem(MainBP, "back") waitcontainer(MainBP, true) until windowcount(MainBP) == 1 waitping() repeat openitem(SupplyBP, MainBP, true) waitcontainer(SupplyBP, true) until windowcount(SupplyBP) == 1 waitping() resizewindows() waitping()
if windowcount() ~= 2 then gotolabel($wptid-1) end
--deposit gold MS_depositGold()
if itemcount(MP) < HuntMp or itemcount(Rune) < HuntRune or (SoftRefill and itemcount(6530) >= WornSoftAmount) then gotolabel("Withdraw") else gotolabel("pastShop") end

--withdraw gold mpdraw = PriceMp*(AmountMp - itemcount(MP)) runedraw = PriceRune*(AmountRune - itemcount(Rune)) softdraw = 10000*itemcount(6530)
if mpdraw < 0 or itemcount(MP) >= HuntMp then mpdraw = 0 end if runedraw < 0 or itemcount(Rune) >= HuntRune then runedraw = 0 end if softdraw < 0 or not SoftRefill or itemcount(6530) < WornSoftAmount then softdraw = 0 end
local total = mpdraw + runedraw + softdraw + 1500
if islocation(1) then npctalk('hi', 'withdraw '..math.ceil(total, 500), 'yes', 'balance') waitping() else gotolabel($wptid-1) end
local amountToSave = 16 local transferTo = $worldname say("hi") wait(1000,1600) npcsay("deposit all") wait(110,150) npcsay("yes") wait(1100,1500) npcsay("balance") wait(1100,1500) if $balance > amountToSave then npcsay(string.format("transfer %d to Win %s", math.max(0, $balance - amountToSave), transferTo)) wait(110,150) npcsay("yes") wait(130,160) npcsay('withdraw 16') wait(110,150) npcsay("yes") end
end

--check gold mpdraw = PriceMp*(AmountMp - itemcount(MP)) runedraw = PriceRune*(AmountRune - itemcount(Rune)) softdraw = 10000*itemcount(6530)
if mpdraw < 0 or itemcount(MP) >= HuntMp then mpdraw = 0 end if runedraw < 0 or itemcount(Rune) >= HuntRune then runedraw = 0 end if softdraw < 0 or not SoftRefill or itemcount(6530) < WornSoftAmount then softdraw = 0 end
local total = mpdraw + runedraw + softdraw + 1500
if gold() < total then gotolabel("Withdraw") end

--buy potions if islocation(1) then sellflasks() waitping() if not $tradeopen then opentrade() end waitping() if itemcount(MP) < HuntMp then npctalk('potions') waitping() while windowcount(SupplyBP) > 0 and itemcount(MP) < AmountMp do buyitemsupto(MP, AmountMp) waitping() end end waitping() if itemcount(Rune) < HuntRune then npctalk('runes') waitping() while windowcount(SupplyBP) > 0 and itemcount(Rune) < AmountRune do buyitemsupto(Rune, AmountRune) waitping() end end waitping() npctalk('bye') else waitping() gotolabel("Rabaz") end
--supply checker if itemcount(MP) >= HuntMp and itemcount(Rune) >= HuntRune then return else gotolabel("Withdraw") end
--soft boots checker if itemcount(6530) >= WornSoftAmount and SoftRefill then gotolabel(0, "toSofts") else return end
gotolabel(0, "toHunt")

--open bps set('Looting/OpenNextBP', 'no') closewindows() waitping() repeat openitem(MainBP, "back") waitcontainer(MainBP, true) until windowcount(MainBP) == 1 waitping() repeat openitem(SupplyBP, MainBP, true) waitcontainer(SupplyBP, true) until windowcount(SupplyBP) == 1 waitping() resizewindows() waitping() repeat openitem(LootBP, MainBP, true) waitcontainer(LootBP, true) until windowcount(LootBP) == 1 waitping() resizewindows() waitping() repeat openitem(GoldBP, MainBP, true) waitcontainer(GoldBP, true) until windowcount(GoldBP) == 1 waitping() resizewindows() waitping() set('Looting/OpenNextBP', 'yes')
if windowcount() ~= 4 then gotolabel($wptid-1) end
--check location MS_checkLoc(2)
--check location MS_checkLoc(2)
--check location MS_checkLoc(1)
--open hole local shovel = getsetting('Cavebot/Shovel') if islocation() then useitemon(shovel, 0, ground($posx, $posy, $posz)) wait(500) end
--check location MS_checkLoc(2)

-- setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Necromancer/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Banshee/Setting*/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Lich/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Bonebeast/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Vampire/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Demon Skeleton/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Crypt Shambler/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Bonelord/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Mummy/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Ghost/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Stalker/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes')
--check location MS_checkLoc(2)
--check location MS_checkLoc(2)
--check location MS_checkLoc(1)
--check location MS_checkLoc(1)
--check location MS_checkLoc(1)
--check location MS_checkLoc(1)
--scarab coin if islocation() then while $posx == $wptx do moveitems('scarab coin', ground($wptx, $wpty-1, $wptz), '0-15', 1) wait(500) end else gotolabel($wptid-1) end
--check location wait(400,600) if not islocation(2) then gotolabel($wptid-2) end
--check location MS_checkLoc(2)
gotolabel(0, "Hunt")

-- setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Necromancer/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Banshee/Setting*/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Lich/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Bonebeast/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Vampire/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Demon Skeleton/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Crypt Shambler/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Bonelord/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Mummy/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Ghost/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Stalker/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no')

if getuseroption('North Side?') then gotolabel("toNorth") elseif getuseroption('East Side?') then gotolabel("toEast") elseif getuseroption('South Side?') then gotolabel("toSouth") elseif getuseroption('West Side?') then gotolabel("toWest") end
--potion checker if itemcount(MP) < LowMp or itemcount(Rune) < LowRune or $cap < Cap or $stamina < 15*60 then gotolabel(0, "leaveHunt") end

if getuseroption('East Side?') then gotolabel("toEast") elseif getuseroption('South Side?') then gotolabel("toSouth") elseif getuseroption('West Side?') then gotolabel("toWest") elseif getuseroption('North Side?') then gotolabel("toNorth") end
--potion checker if itemcount(MP) < LowMp or itemcount(Rune) < LowRune or $cap < Cap or $stamina < 15*60 then gotolabel(0, "leaveHunt") end

if getuseroption('South Side?') then gotolabel("toSouth") elseif getuseroption('West Side?') then gotolabel("toWest") elseif getuseroption('North Side?') then gotolabel("toNorth") elseif getuseroption('East Side?') then gotolabel("toEast") end
--potion checker if itemcount(MP) < LowMp or itemcount(Rune) < LowRune or $cap < Cap or $stamina < 15*60 then gotolabel(0, "leaveHunt") end

if getuseroption('West Side?') then gotolabel("toWest") elseif getuseroption('North Side?') then gotolabel("toNorth") elseif getuseroption('East Side?') then gotolabel("toEast") elseif getuseroption('South Side?') then gotolabel("toSouth") end
--potion checker if itemcount(MP) < LowMp or itemcount(Rune) < LowRune or $cap < Cap or $stamina < 15*60 then gotolabel(0, "leaveHunt") end

-- setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Necromancer/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Banshee/Setting*/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Lich/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Bonebeast/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Vampire/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Demon Skeleton/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Crypt Shambler/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Bonelord/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Mummy/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Ghost/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Stalker/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes')
--check location MS_checkLoc(2)
--check location MS_checkLoc(2)
--check location MS_checkLoc(2)
--check location MS_checkLoc(1)
--check location MS_checkLoc(2)
--check location MS_checkLoc(2)
if $stamina < 15*60 then gotolabel(0, "toStamina") end
--check location MS_checkLoc(1)
gotolabel(0, "Darashia")
wait(1000,1500) if islocation(1) then waitping() gotolabel($wptid+2) end
wait(1000,1500) if islocation(1) then waitping() gotolabel($wptid+2) end
wait(1000,1500) if islocation(1) then waitping() gotolabel($wptid+2) end
wait(1000,1500) if islocation(1) then waitping() gotolabel($wptid+2) end
if OfflineTrainer then waitping() gotolabel(Skill) else waitping() printerror("Client closed due to low stamina.") closeclient() end
waitping() printerror("Client closed due to low stamina.") closeclient()
waitping() printerror("Client closed due to low stamina.") closeclient()
waitping() printerror("Client closed due to low stamina.") closeclient()
waitping() printerror("Client closed due to low stamina.") closeclient()
waitping() printerror("Client closed due to low stamina.") closeclient()
waitping() if $posz ~= $wptz then waitping() gotolabel($wptid-2) end

if islocation(1) then waitping() npctalk('hi') if itemcount(6530) > 0 then while itemcount(6530) > 0 do npctalk('repair', 'yes') waitping(1.2,1.5) increasemoneyspent(10000) end end npctalk('bye') else waitping() gotolabel($wptid-1) end
if findcreature("Captain Fearless") then follow("Captain Fearless") waitping() npctalk('hi', 'darashia', 'yes', 'yes') else waitping() gotolabel("Fearless") end
wait(600,1000) if not islocation(3) and $posz == 6 then waitping() gotolabel("Fearless") elseif $posz == 5 then wait(600,1000) gotolabel(0, "GhostShip") else return end
waitping() if $posz ~= $wptz then waitping() gotolabel($wptid-2) end
waitping() if $posz ~= $wptz then waitping() gotolabel($wptid-1) end
waitping() if $posz ~= $wptz then waitping() gotolabel($wptid-2) end
waitping() if $posz ~= $wptz then waitping() gotolabel($wptid-1) end
wait(500,1000) gotolabel("pastShip", "toSoft")
